roleset.name: to make susceptible, be susceptible to
roleset.note: PREDISPOSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'predispose' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from predispose.01-v predicate notes)
PREDISPOSITION-N NOTES: Based on temprel and stratified data. Comparison to predispose.01. Predispose is a member of VN class addict-96. Framed by Katie. (from predisposition.01-n)

roles.note: Arg 0 from the predispose.01 frame has been left out. No example of an agent with predisposition could be found. (from predisposition.01-n)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: The scientists say that since breast cancer often strikes multiple members of certain families , the gene , when [*] inherited in a damaged form [*T*-1], may predispose women to the cancer .
example.arg: the gene , when [*] inherited in a damaged form [*T*-1],

example.name: both args
example.text: her genetic predisposition to breast cancer
